entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to as 'Harry'.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's, who is disapproving of his actions.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is teasing Hermione.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: A person whose Remembrall was stolen by Harry.

relationships.description: Hermione is disapproving of Harry's actions, as seen in the text: 'looking disapprovingly at the package in Harry’s hand'.
Ron is teasing Hermione, as seen in the text: 'Yes, don’t stop now ,’ said Ron, ‘it’s doing us so much good.’
Harry stole Neville's Remembrall, as mentioned in the text: 'If he hadn’t stolen Neville’s Remembrall I wouldn’t be in the team ...’
